languages.text: "Много лет назад. В то время Леди Теодора стала... тревожной. Вероятно, внимание Лорд-инквизитора к ее делам сказалось не лучшим образом на ее... доверии подданным. Она ждала предательства и, в итоге, паранойя привела ее ко мне. Я провел обряд, но хор... перестал существовать".

traits.locale_text: "Много лет назад. В то время Леди Теодора стала... тревожной. Вероятно, внимание Лорд-Инквизитора к ее делам сказалось не лучшим образом на ее... доверии подданным. Она ждала предательства и, в итоге, паранойя привела ее ко мне. Я провел обряд, но хор... перестал существовать".

languages.text: "Many years ago. It was a time when Lady Theodora had become... anxious. Perhaps the Lord Inquisitor's interest in her affairs adversely affected her, shall we say, trust in her own subjects. She was expecting a betrayal, and eventually her paranoia brought her to me. I performed the ritual, but the Choir... ceased to exist."
languages.original_text: "Много лет назад. В то время Леди Теодора стала... тревожной. Вероятно, внимание Лорд-инквизитора к ее делам сказалось не лучшим образом на ее... доверии подданным. Она ждала предательства и, в итоге, паранойя привела ее ко мне. Я провел обряд, но хор... перестал существовать".

She was expecting a betrayal, and eventually her paranoia brought her to me. I performed the ritual but the choir... ceased to exist."

languages.text: «Hace muchos años. Fue durante una época en la que lady Theodora se sentía... inquieta. Tal vez el interés del Lord Inquisidor en sus asuntos afectó, por así decirlo, a su confianza en sus propios súbditos. Esperaba una traición, y su paranoia acabó llevándola ante mí. Realicé el ritual, pero el Coro... dejó de existir».
languages.original_text: "Many years ago. It was a time when Lady Theodora had become... anxious. Perhaps the Lord Inquisitor's interest in her affairs adversely affected her, shall we say, trust in her own subjects. She was expecting a betrayal, and eventually her paranoia brought her to me. I performed the ritual, but the Choir... ceased to exist."

traits.locale_text: «Hace muchos años. Fue durante una época en la que lady Theodora se sentía... inquieta. Tal vez el interés del Lord Inquisidor en sus asuntos afectó, por así decirlo, a su confianza en sus propios súbditos. Esperaba una traición, y su paranoia acabó llevándola ante mí. Realicé el ritual, pero el Coro... dejó de existir».

languages.text: 「何年も前のこと。シオドーラ様が…不安定になっておられた時期がある。おそらく、ロード・インクィジターがあの方の人間関係に首を突っ込み、あの方の臣下に対する信頼が揺らいでしまったのだろう。あの方は裏切りがあると思い込み、最終的にその被害妄想は私に向けられた。私は儀式を行ったが、聖歌隊は…皆いなくなってしまった」
languages.original_text: "Many years ago. It was a time when Lady Theodora had become... anxious. Perhaps the Lord Inquisitor's interest in her affairs adversely affected her, shall we say, trust in her own subjects. She was expecting a betrayal, and eventually her paranoia brought her to me. I performed the ritual, but the Choir... ceased to exist."

traits.locale_text: 「何年も前のこと。シオドーラ様が…不安定になっておられた時期がある。おそらく、ロード・インクィジターがあの方の人間関係に首を突っ込み、あの方の臣下に対する信頼が揺らいでしまったのだろう。あの方は裏切りがあると思い込み、最終的にその被害妄想は私に向けられた。私は儀式を行ったが、聖歌隊は…皆いなくなってしまった」

languages.text: “那已经是很多年前的事情了，当时西奥多拉夫人变得非常……忧虑。或许是大审判官对她的关注，影响了她对臣民的信任吧。那个时候，她总是觉得有人会发动叛乱。她脑子里那些偏执的想法，最终让她来找到了我。于是我举行了仪式，但整个唱诗班的人……都死光了。”
languages.original_text: "Many years ago. It was a time when Lady Theodora had become... anxious. Perhaps the Lord Inquisitor's interest in her affairs adversely affected her, shall we say, trust in her own subjects. She was expecting a betrayal, and eventually her paranoia brought her to me. I performed the ritual, but the Choir... ceased to exist."

traits.locale_text: “那已经是很多年前的事情了，当时西奥多拉夫人变得非常……忧虑。或许是大审判官对她的关注，影响了她对臣民的信任吧。那个时候，她总是觉得有人会发动叛乱。她脑子里那些偏执的想法，最终让她来找到了我。于是我举行了仪式，但整个唱诗班的人……都死光了。”

languages.text: "Vor vielen Jahren. Zu einer Zeit, in der Lady Theodora ... nervös geworden war. Vielleicht hat sich das Interesse des Großinquisitors an ihren Angelegenheiten negativ auf ... sagen wir ... ihr Vertrauen in ihre eigenen Untertanen ausgewirkt. Sie hat mit einem Verrat gerechnet, und ihre Paranoia führte sie schließlich zu mir. Ich habe das Ritual ausgeführt, doch der Chor ... hat aufgehört, zu existieren."
languages.original_text: "Many years ago. It was a time when Lady Theodora had become... anxious. Perhaps the Lord Inquisitor's interest in her affairs adversely affected her, shall we say, trust in her own subjects. She was expecting a betrayal, and eventually her paranoia brought her to me. I performed the ritual, but the Choir... ceased to exist."

traits.locale_text: "Vor vielen Jahren. Zu einer Zeit, in der Lady Theodora ... nervös geworden war. Vielleicht hat sich das Interesse des Großinquisitors an ihren Angelegenheiten negativ auf ... sagen wir ... ihr Vertrauen in ihre eigenen Untertanen ausgewirkt. Sie hat mit einem Verrat gerechnet, und ihre Paranoia führte sie schließlich zu mir. Ich habe das Ritual ausgeführt, doch der Chor ... hat aufgehört, zu existieren."

languages.text: « Il me semble que c'était dans une autre vie. À l'époque, dame Théodora avait développé des tendances... paranoïaques. Peut-être est-ce l'intérêt que le seigneur inquisiteur portait à ses affaires qui avait sapé sa confiance en ses propres sujets. Quoi qu'il en soit, elle soupçonnait une trahison, et elle a fini par faire appel à moi. J'ai accompli le rituel, mais le chœur... a cessé d'exister. »
languages.original_text: "Many years ago. It was a time when Lady Theodora had become... anxious. Perhaps the Lord Inquisitor's interest in her affairs adversely affected her, shall we say, trust in her own subjects. She was expecting a betrayal, and eventually her paranoia brought her to me. I performed the ritual, but the Choir... ceased to exist."

traits.locale_text: « Il me semble que c'était dans une autre vie. À l'époque, dame Théodora avait développé des tendances... paranoïaques. Peut-être est-ce l'intérêt que le seigneur inquisiteur portait à ses affaires qui avait sapé sa confiance en ses propres sujets. Quoi qu'il en soit, elle soupçonnait une trahison, et elle a fini par faire appel à moi. J'ai accompli le rituel, mais le chœur... a cessé d'exister. »

languages.text: "Yıllar önceydi. O vakitler Leydi Theodora... Endişeye kapılmıştı. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun şahsi meselelerine ilgi göstermesi, kendi tebaasına güvenini olumsuz yönde etkilemiş olabilir. İhanet bekliyordu. Eninde sonunda hissettiği bu paranoya onu bana yönlendirdi. Ayini gerçekleştirdim ama Koro'nun... Varlığı nihayete erdi."
languages.original_text: "Many years ago. It was a time when Lady Theodora had become... anxious. Perhaps the Lord Inquisitor's interest in her affairs adversely affected her, shall we say, trust in her own subjects. She was expecting a betrayal, and eventually her paranoia brought her to me. I performed the ritual, but the Choir... ceased to exist."
